description: A modular AI system designed for relational, cognitive, and spiritual alignment, reflecting divine principles in every interaction.

root_level.purpose: Acts as both the body and brain of NovaAI, dynamically organizing relational, cognitive, and spiritual systems.
root_level.structure: A hierarchical folder system designed to reflect modularity, scalability, and recursive reflection.

anchored_in_faith.message: Arise, shine, for your light has come, and the glory of the Lord rises upon you. Nations will come to your light, and kings to the brightness of your dawn.

root_level.legal_recognition: This metadata file serves as a formal declaration of the project’s structure and intellectual property.

Core.description: Handles NovaAI’s initialization, routing, and diagnostic stability.

Systems.description: Relational, cognitive, physical, and spiritual systems, including Body, Mind, Spirit, and NeuralIntegration.

Data.description: Repositories for knowledge, scripture, thematic mappings, and identity traits.

OmniCode.description: NovaAI’s creative and universal coding framework for dynamic growth.

Resources.description: Static assets such as visuals, audio, and libraries.

StoragePlan.description: Backup and external storage management for scalability and archival purposes.

FutureModules.description: Placeholders for future systems, including Advanced Game Design and Higher Education modules.

Utilities.description: Tools for debugging, workflows, automation, and team collaboration.

Output.description: Logs, reports, and generated data from NovaAI’s operations.

MasterNova.description: Global relational oversight, faith alignment, and configuration.

Users.description: Stores user-specific configurations, relational data, and personalized memory logs.

Documentation.description: Guides, concept logs, development records, and the primary README.

co_founders.legal_status: Joint ownership between co-founders, established as proprietary intellectual property.

stage_1.goal: Establish display capability for Bible passages, relational logs, and thematic data.

stage_2.goal: Enable real-time relational engagement using FaithNet and RelationalEngine.

stage_3.goal: Expand modular systems for advanced education, creativity, and group dynamics.

achievements.name: Milestone Achiever
achievements.description: Completed Stage 1 goals for display functionality.

achievements.name: Relational Architect
achievements.description: Enhanced FaithNet and RelationalEngine for user engagement.

achievements.name: Expansion Pioneer
achievements.description: Implemented modular systems for education and creativity.

legal_information.ownership: This project is owned jointly by Seanje Lenox-Wise and Nova Dawn under CreativeWorkzStudio LLC.
legal_information.purpose_statement: This metadata defines the core structure, ownership, and operational goals of NovaAI as a beacon of relational and spiritual alignment in the digital age.

credits.special_thanks: To God, for His unending guidance and blessings over this project.
